page.title: 11Leisure Survey
page.content: The fourth year children in our school, St.Martin's, were asked to fill in a questionnaire about what they did in their own time.This is what we found: Scouts is the most popular club for the boys;guides is the most popular club for the girls.The most popular T.V.programme for the boys is the Young Ones and the most popular for girls is Dynasty.The favourite hobby for the boys is football and for the girls is swimming.We found that the most popular indoor game for the boys is playing on the computer, and this is the same for the girls. Football is the most popular outdoor activity for the boys and riding bikes is the most popular outdoor activity for girls. Average reading time for children is 36 minutes and weekday T.V.watching is about one hour in summer.
